channel.title: Cryptocurrency on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in Cryptocurrency on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 DigitalNote XDN Logo
DigitalNote utilizes a hybrid distribution method, organizing both PoW and PoS together onto a singular blockchain. Hybrid systems are still relatively new, as few blockchains employ a robust enough difficulty algorithm which adjusts the time span between generated blocks for either PoW or PoS in unison. A custom difficulty retargeting algorithm known as “VRX” was created for DigitalNote in order to allow for proper shuffling of generated block types within a full hybrid blockchain.
You can download theDigitalNotelogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: DigitalNote
item.description: DigitalNote utilizes a hybrid distribution method, organizing both PoW and PoS together onto a singular blockchain. Hybrid systems are still relatively new, as few blockchains employ a robust enough difficulty algorithm which adjusts the time span between generated blocks for either PoW or PoS in unison. A custom difficulty retargeting algorithm known as “VRX” was created for DigitalNote in order to allow for proper shuffling of generated block types within a full hybrid blockchain.

<! [CDATA[
DogeCash (DOGEC) Logo DogeCash is a transparent, community-governed cryptocurrency utilized by its high-quality platforms. Buy DogeCash All the hard work has been done for you Your ready-to-go crypto Self-governed DogeCash governance system allows masternodes holders to choose the path to go. Learn more Privacy With PIVX at his core, DogeCash cares about your privacy. Source
You can download theDogeCashlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Blockstream Logo Blockstream is a blockchain technology company led by co-founder Adam Back, headquartered in Victoria, Canada, with offices and staff worldwide. The company develops a range of products and services for the storage and transfer of Bitcoin and other digital assets. The company has raised $210M to date from investors, including venture capital firms Horizons Ventures, Mosaic Ventures, and AXA Strategic Ventures. Source
You can download theBlockstreamlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >

The company has raised $210M to date from investors, including venture capital firms Horizons Ventures, Mosaic Ventures, and AXA Strategic Ventures. Source
